gobblin.metrics

Interface ContextAwareMetricFactory<T extends ContextAwareMetric>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareCounterFactory, ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareHistogramFactory, ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareMeterFactory, ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareTimerFactory

    public interface ContextAwareMetricFactory<T extends ContextAwareMetric>
    An interface for factory classes for ContextAwareMetrics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareCounterFactory
      A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareCounters.
      static class  ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareHistogramFactory
      A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareHistograms.
      static class  ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareMeterFactory
      A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareMeters.
      static class  ContextAwareMetricFactory.ContextAwareTimerFactory
      A default implementation of ContextAwareMetricFactory for ContextAwareTimers.

    • Method Detail

      • newMetric

        T newMetric(MetricContext context,
            String name)
        Create a new context-aware metric.
        Parameters:
        context - the MetricContext of the metric
        name - metric name
        Returns:
        the newly created metric

      • isInstance

        boolean isInstance(com.codahale.metrics.Metric metric)
        Check if a given metric is an instance of the type of context-aware metrics created by this ContextAwareMetricFactory.
        Parameters:
        metric - the given metric
        Returns:
        true if the given metric is an instance of the type of context-aware metrics created by this ContextAwareMetricFactory, false otherwise.
